      • sum

        public WordDFIDF sum()
        An explicit assumption is made that WordDFIDF instances all come from the same period of time and therefore have the same total number of tweets and total number of word instances across time (i.e. WordDFIDF.Ttf and WordDFIDF.Twf remain untouched)
        Specified by:
